name: Prospective Residential ASHP (FS)
_description: 10 yr ET target - switch fossil-based heating and associated cooling to heat pumps, non-cold-climate

market_entry_year_source.notes: Program target year for the technology performance level indicated by this ECM

installed_cost_source.notes: average US cost based on scout 5 yr payback; note that cost is based on heating

product_lifetime_source.notes: Median of average lifetimes for 2020 'typical' residential air source heat pump

market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all residential fuel-fired heating; no electric heating is switched by this ECM

cooling.title: RECS 2015 Microdata
cooling.fraction_derivation: Central AC multiple of 59.5% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a ducted cooling system where heating is done using any non-electric heating energy source. Total homes with ducted cooling in the sample is 76,090,522, and then filtered for homes with fuel-fired heating system (45,241,958).
